_header: O mortal man behold take tent to me
_description: Robert Henryson, ‘The Ressoning betuix Deth and Man’ — six 8-line stanzas

Banna.First Lines:
O mortall man behold tak tent to meQuhilk sowld thy mirrour be
                    baith day & nicht…
Banna.Last Lines:
…Iesus on the with peteous voce I cryMercy on me to haif on
                    domisday
Banna.Attributed Title: The ressoning betuix Deth and man (f. 56)

NLS18514.Note:
Mostly illegible, ink faint; added to flyleaf by a hand of the sixteenth
                    century; ten 4-line stanzas written two lines of verse per line in
                    MS.
